About Me

Allow me to explain

BIO

I'm a 2nd year Computer Science bachelor, who is currently exploring roles which will aid me to become more well rounded in the realm of software development, I'm keen in fintech, AI, ML, blockchain, & backend development. I was studying an electrical engineering degree before this and I was in my 3rd year. I realised I had no passion for electrical engineering and made a decision to switch into something I'm more passionate about. some say why did I spend 3 years to realise this? I say it was hard to give up because I wanted to give my best efforts. I would like to gain more experience and knowledge with the same grit but with a passion upon given opportunities.

11Point2

Engineering Intern

Through my experience with 11point2, I developed a deep understanding on Hydrogen, Ammonia, Wind & Solar energy, Carbon capture and emissions. Understood about the engineering, manufacturing, economics (including financial), and the Trades of it. This opportunity helped me in developing an interest and in these industries and made me keep up to date with.

Advisors Alliance

Finance Intern

Learnt about the insurance industry, specifically on health and financial. I learnt how to create insurance plans and pitched a successful sale. Although not my domain, but I was curious about this industry and wanted to venture into it deeper.
